sentences.en: Always smile dazzlingly - it will light up your life.
sentences.cn: 永远保持灿烂的微笑 -- 它会照亮你的一生.

sentences.en: But things do change when she meets the mysterious and dazzlingly beautiful Edward Cullen.
sentences.cn: 然而,当她遇到了神秘而英俊的爱德华·卡伦后,她的生活开始发生改变.

sentences.en: He suddenly drew back the curtain, and felt that the sunshine was dazzlingly bright.
sentences.cn: 他猛地拉开窗帘, 只感到天光刺眼.

sentences.en: How to smile dazzlingly – it will light up your life.
sentences.cn: 怎样灿烂地笑——它会点亮你的人生.

sentences.en: I believe that a phoenix that rises from its ashes will be even more dazzlingly beautiful.
sentences.cn: 我始终相信,从火浴中重生的凤凰,将会更夺目!

sentences.en: Look, it is exquisite and dazzlingly brilliant and its value is incomparable.
sentences.cn: 看, 它玲珑剔透、光彩奕奕,它的价值无与伦比.

sentences.en: The loading bay seemed dazzlingly bright.
sentences.cn: 装货区看上去灯火通明。

sentences.en: The palace looks dazzlingly brilliant and splendid in green and gold.
sentences.cn: 这座宫殿看上去光彩夺目,金碧辉煌.

sentences.en: The spectacle was so dazzlingly beautiful that it beggared description.
sentences.cn: 这景象美极了,简直无法形容.

sentences.en: There are two occasions when the sacred beauty of Creation dazzlingly apparent, and they occur together.
sentences.cn: 创世纪的神圣之美在两种情形下分外耀眼夺目, 而这两种情形总是结伴而行.

sentences.en: They were dazzlingly white with long necks . They were swans.
sentences.cn: 他们有长长的脖子,全身是令人眩目的白色.
